references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is the foundation of Stable Diffusion, a widely used image generation model, thus crucial for understanding the landscape of text-to-image generation.
This paper introduces Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPMs), a foundational method for diffusion models, which are central to the current research.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper presents Score-based Generative Modeling (SGMs) via stochastic differential equations (SDEs), another core technique that underlies the diffusion model approach, offering a different perspective on generative modeling.

references.paper_title: Training language models to follow instructions with human feedback
references.reason: This paper describes a process that trains language models to follow instructions with human feedback, enabling fine-grained feedback.

references.paper_title: Sdxl: Improving latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper discusses improving latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis.
